data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Heteranassa Smith, 1899 (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Omopterini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Homziak, Nicholas, Hopkins, Heidi, Miller, Kelly B. (2015): Revision of the genus Heteranassa Smith, 1899 (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Omopterini). ZooKeys 527: 31-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.527.8771, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.527.8771
